verbose_text: The fMRI technique used in this study, as first proposed by Ogawa et al. [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], can be used to assess cortical activation by analyzing changes in the levels of oxygenated and deoxygenated hemoglobin in different areas of the brain in real time.
evidence: levels of oxygenated and deoxygenated hemoglobin
